title: I for one found this April Fools Draven hilarious.
body:
Seriously, this got a chuckle out of me when I opened the website. Nice one Rito.

RIP Amumu's party and potential friends. Maybe next year will bring better luck to him.

replies.body: Why haha? He thought it was funny.. thats all... {{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}
